subject: Re: Cheaper radios/parts
author: ppsmeet@verizon.net
full_text:
Wish I had gotten the info just a little earlier. I went to Radioshack this morning and got the $30 radio. I'll keep my eyes peeled for the cheap versions. In the meantime I'll be trying to work through the site to make this 12-587 into a franks box.

Thanks,

Mark
Phoenixville Paranormal Society
http://www.meetup.com/pps-mu/
